channel.title: Emo Rock CD Drop Rates
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Emo Rock CD Drop Rates" - Does Kona-chan increase the drop rate of Emo Rock CDs?

item.title: Re: Emo Rock CD Drop Rates
item.content:encoded: Actually, if you've got Survived the Impossible, you can get a pretty great drop rate by running outskirts/wasteland missions (outskirts would be easier) with Sticky, Flutie, and Tubby. All 3 of them drop the CD's, I think. Plus, they give the range (especially with lvl 2 versions) to just about, with reaper sword jutsu and letter of marque, to pass anything. And if somehow you don't have the range, just use their lvl 1 jutsu to bump it even higher. At least, I've found it to be a pretty decent drop rate. I've got over 60 of them right nowâ€¦

item.title: Re: Emo Rock CD Drop Rates
item.content:encoded: "..finding items.." Nothing said about ally drops, so no, she doesn't boost the ally drop chance.

item.title: Re: Emo Rock CD Drop Rates
item.content:encoded: Um, maybe I should clarify. According to the Wiki page, Kona-chan's abilitiy is "Double chance of finding Items with less than a 5% base drop rate". I was wondering if the drop rate of Emo Rock CDs is under 5%, therefore allowing Kona-chan's ability to work and doubling my chance of getting a drop. It'd be helpful if anyone had info on any other ally drops Kona-chan works on, as well.

item.title: Re: Emo Rock CD Drop Rates
item.content:encoded: the best way to get the Emo Rock CDs is by having Emosuke in your team. Other than that, it's pretty hard to get drops from anyone else.

item.title: Emo Rock CD Drop Rates
item.content:encoded: Emo Rock CDs are a pretty sparse drop, but I'm not sure if the rate is under 5% or not.
